pr3k.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • pr3k.database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a set of methods for the client side to retrieve information out of the database.
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Mike Westbrook
